resources.string:
• Batches App Prepares Batches and Corresponding Attendance Sheets.
  • Enter your School/College Name, Code, Subject and other details using [Set] preferrence dailog
  • Create New Batch using [New] button and then entering first and last Seat Number. Tick and select the Seat Numbers from the list, scrolling the list gently as required.
  • Press [Pick] to verify the selection you have made.
  • Press [Save] button to save the Batch.
  • Press [@] button to send the current batch to the email(s) mentioned in preferences.
  • Repeat the process to create required number of batches.
  • Use open source Thunderbird pop client with addon - Attachment Extracter - to auto-collect all batches in one folder where BatchesPrint.jar is kept. Using BatchesPrint you bulk print them.
  • Alternatively you can use Dukto (Free Sofware) or any other file transfer app to send batches (.bch) files from Android to PC.
  • BatchesCreate.jar is a clone desktop Application of Batches App. You can create or modify .bch files.
  • BatchesFix is another utility to generate Time Table from these batches..
  • All Batches related Apps are available free along with source code on Sourceforge website in one zip file.
  • Download Link : http://sourceforge.net/projects/Batches/
